/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. The trees, standing tall and proud, add a sense of tranquility to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the vast expanse. The perspective of the image is from the center of the street, looking down its length, giving a sense of depth and distance. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
